experiences.description: Developed and maintained data pipelines for manufacturing and supply chain data. Implemented data quality checks and improved data accuracy. Worked with large datasets to optimize production processes.

Led a team of data engineers in building and scaling data infrastructure for robotics and AI research. Designed and implemented ETL pipelines for diverse data sources. Collaborated with data scientists to build machine learning models.

Responsible for the architecture and implementation of a cloud-based data platform. Implemented data warehousing solutions and developed data governance policies. Mentored junior data engineers and provided technical leadership. Optimized existing data pipelines resulting in a 30% performance increase.

education.description: Focused on data structures, algorithms, and database systems. Completed a senior project on distributed data processing.
Specialized in machine learning, data mining, and big data technologies. Conducted research on scalable data analysis algorithms. GPA: 3.9/4.0
